thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Emma
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Emma

author: Emma
title: Emma
text: Very quick delivery. Only quibble was the button on the rugby top was loose and came off as soon as I tried it on. However, I brought it back to my local store and they sorted out replacement top without fuss. Absolutely no hesitation recommending online service expect ally given local store staff are very happy to help out with returns etc.
